rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Harvard University, esky Harvardova univerzita (nzev podle J. Harvarda, proto je oznaen Harvardsk chybn), byla zaloena roku 1636 a je nejstar univerzitou na zem USA. Sdl ve mst Cambridge ve stt Massachusetts v bostonsk aglomeraci a pat k nejprestinjm univerzitm ve Spojench sttech. Jako nesttn univerzita je rovn lenem Ivy League.
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: i hc Harvard (Harvard University) l mt trng i hc t thc to lc thnh ph Cambridge, Massachusetts, Hoa K v l mt thnh vin ca Ivy League. c thnh lp ngy 8 thng 9 nm 1636 bi c quan Lp php thuc a Massachusetts, Havard l i hc lu i nht ti Hoa K, cng l c s gio dc i hc u tin chu M. N cng l tp on u tin ti Bc M. i hc Harvard bao gm 10 trng con. Vi tn gi ban u l "New College" hay "the college at New Towne", trng c i tn thnh Harvard College vo ngy 13 thng 3 nm 1639, sau khi John Harvard, mt mc s tr tui Charlestown, hin tng cho trng mt th vin khong 400 u sch v 779 bng Anh (khong phn na ti sn ca ng). Vn kin u tin cp n Harvard vi danh xng "vin i hc"(university) l bn Hin php Massachusetts nm 1780. Trong nhim k ko di 40 nm (1869-1909) ca mnh, Vin trng Charles William Eliot thay i trit Harvard thnh mt i hc nghin cu. Cc ci cch ca Eliot bao gm cc kha hc nhim , m hnh lp hc nh, v cc k thi tuyn. M hnh ca Harvard c nh hng trn nn gio dc quc gia Hoa K, cp i hc v trung hc. Th vin i hc Harvard vi hn 15 triu u sch l th vin trng hc ln nht th gii, v ng th t trong s nm "th vin hng triu" (mega-library) ca th gii. Harvard thng xuyn c mt hoc gn v tr u tin trong cc bng xp hng gio dc i hc quc t. Harvard cng l t chc c ngun cung ng ti chnh ln th hai, vi khong 28,8 t USD vo nm 2008.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Luniversit Harvard (Harvard University), ou plus simplement Harvard, est une universit prive amricaine situe Cambridge dans le Massachusetts. Fonde en 1636, elle est l'tablissement d'enseignement suprieur le plus ancien des tats-Unis. Elle fait partie du Ivy League, association non officielle regroupant les huit universits les plus anciennes et les plus clbres des tats-Unis. Quarante-cinq prix Nobel sont sortis de ses rangs (2010).
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: La Universitat Harvard s una de les institucions educatives ms prestigioses del mn i la ms antiga dels Estats Units d'Amrica. Fundada el 8 de setembre de 1636 com a New College a Cambridge, va ser rebatejada el 13 de mar de 1639 en honor a John Harvard, un dels seus principals mecenes. Harvard s una universitat privada i compta amb el major pressupost manejat per una universitat en el planeta. Amb un percentatge d'admissi a vegades inferior al 10%, tamb s una de les ms selectives. De mitjana, Harvard t una poblaci estudiantil de prop de 6.650 estudiants de llicenciatura (primer cicle) i uns 13.000 a nivell postgrau (segon i tercer cicle).
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: De Harvard-universiteit is een Amerikaanse particuliere universiteit die hoofdzakelijk in Cambridge (Massachusetts) is gevestigd. De Harvard Business School ligt samen met de sportfaciliteiten, tegenover de rest van de campus aan de kant van Boston aan de rivier de Charles. De Harvard Medical School is gevestigd in het medische district Longwood dichter bij het centrum van Boston, waar een aantal bekende gespecialiseerde ziekenhuizen liggen.

Harvard University, egentlig President and Fellows of Harvard College er et privat universitet i Cambridge i Massachusetts. Det er medlem av sammenslutningen Ivy League. Universitetet ble grunnlagt 8. september 1636 og er den eldste institusjonen for hyere utdannelse i USA. I flere internasjonale kringer er det havnet helt p topp, og har dermed blitt ansett som verdens ledende universitet. Harvard inntar frste plass globalt p Times' liste over verdens beste universiteter.

L'Universit di Harvard (Harvard University), a Cambridge, nell'area metropolitana della citt di Boston nel Massachusetts, un'universit privata di grande notoriet ed il pi antico ateneo degli Stati Uniti d'America. Fa parte della Ivy League, associazione privata fra le otto universit pi antiche degli Stati Uniti, ed una delle tre pi prestigiose universit degli Stati Uniti d'America, assieme all'Universit Yale e all'Universit di Princeton.

Nazw otrzyma od nazwiska duchownego purytaskiego, wielebnego Johna Harvarda, ktry by pierwszym darczyc uczelni, wwczas bdcej college'em. Harvard oy na utrzymanie szkoy, od momentu jej powstania do swojej mierci. W testamencie zapisa jej swoj bibliotek i poow majtku.

rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Harvard University r USA:s ldsta universitet, grundat den 18 september (8 september enl. g.s. ) 1636 i Cambridge (en frort till Boston) i Massachusetts, av regeringen i Massachusetts. Universitet tillhr de hgst ansedda i USA, r medlem av Ivy League och har traditionellt utbildat en stor del av USA:s politiska elit, ssom presidenterna George W. Bush, John F. Kennedy, Barack Obama och Franklin D. Roosevelt. ven kompositrerna Leroy Anderson, Leonard Bernstein och Serbiens utrikesminister Vuk Jeremi studerade vid Harvard.

rdf:Description.dbpprop:title: Links to related articles
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Harvard University, egentlig President and Fellows of Harvard College er et privat universitet i Cambridge i Massachusetts. Det er medlem av sammenslutningen Ivy League. Universitetet ble grunnlagt 8. september 1636 og er den eldste institusjonen for hyere utdannelse i USA. I flere internasjonale kringer er det havnet helt p topp, og har dermed blitt ansett som verdens ledende universitet. Harvard inntar frste plass globalt p Times' liste over verdens beste universiteter. Skolepengene er p US$ 33709 i 2006, og det tildeles alle gradsniver opp til doktorgrad (Ph. D). Det er oppkalt etter presten John Harvard, som testamenterte noen hundre bker til etablere skolens bibliotek, i tillegg til flere hundre pund. Universitetet har det strste pengefondet av alle verdens utdanningsinstitusjoner, pr. 2005 verdt 22,6 milliarder dollar. Harvards alumninettverk har ca 335000 medlemmer.

Die Harvard University (kurz Harvard) ist eine private Universitt in Cambridge, Massachusetts im Groraum Boston an der Ostkste der Vereinigten Staaten. Die Hochschule wurde 1636 von der Massachusetts Bay Colony gegrndet und ist damit die lteste Universitt in den Vereinigten Staaten. Die Umbenennung erfolgte 1639 in Anerkennung des Erbes von John Harvard. Harvard erreicht in internationalen Vergleichen regelmig einen Platz unter den besten Eliteuniversitten.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Harvard University is an American private Ivy League research university located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States, established in 1636 by the Massachusetts legislature. Harvard is the oldest institution of higher learning in the United States and the first corporation (officially The President and Fellows of Harvard College) chartered in the country. Harvard's history, influence, and wealth have made it one of the most prestigious universities in the world.

Harvardin yliopisto on yhdysvaltalainen yliopisto Cambridgessa lhell Bostonia, Massachusettsin osavaltiossa. Se sijoittuu snnllisesti krkitiloille maailman yliopistojen vlisiss vertailuissa ja on maailmalla erittin arvostettu. Esimerkiksi Times Higher Edition -lehden laatimalla listalla Harvard oli vuonna 2009 maailman paras yliopisto. Harvard on yksityinen yliopisto, joka perustettiin vuonna 1636 ja nimettiin ensimmisen lahjoittajan, John Harvardin, mukaan.
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Harvardin yliopisto on yhdysvaltalainen yliopisto Cambridgessa lhell Bostonia, Massachusettsin osavaltiossa. Se sijoittuu snnllisesti krkitiloille maailman yliopistojen vlisiss vertailuissa ja on maailmalla erittin arvostettu. Esimerkiksi Times Higher Edition -lehden laatimalla listalla Harvard oli vuonna 2009 maailman paras yliopisto. Harvard on yksityinen yliopisto, joka perustettiin vuonna 1636 ja nimettiin ensimmisen lahjoittajan, John Harvardin, mukaan. Se on Yhdysvaltojen vanhin yliopisto. Yliopisto kuuluu Ivy Leagueen, itrannikon kahdeksan yksityisen huippukorkeakoulun verkostoon. Harvardissa on yksi maailman suurimmista yliopistokirjastoista. Harvard saa paljon rahoitusta toimintaansa, Harvardin budjetti oli vuonna 2005 noin 2,59 miljardia dollaria / 2 miljardia euroa . Yksi suurimmista lahjoittajista on Bill Gates, joka on mys opiskellut Harvardissa. Omaisuutta yliopistolla on 29,2 miljardia dollaria. Harvardin henkilkuntaan kuuluu noin 2300 tyntekij. Opiskelijoita on lhes 20 000, joista suurin osa, noin 13 000, ovat jatko-opiskelijoita. Harvardin mottona on Veritas, joka on latinaa ja tarkoittaa totuutta. Yliopiston tunnusvri on voimakas punainen (crimson), joka on mys Harvardin urheilujoukkueiden nimiss ja Harvardin pivittisen uutislehden, The Harvard Crimsonin, nimess. Harvardissa on opiskellut 75 Nobel-voittajaa ja 15 Pulitzer-palkinnon voittajaa. Harvardiin on vaikea pst sisn. Vuonna 2006 yliopistoon psi vain noin 9,3% hakijoista. Harvardin sti on yliopistomaailman rikkain lahjoitusrahasto. Harvardin yliopisto on jakautunut kahteen kampukseen, joista pkampus sijoittuu Cambridgen kaupungin puolelle. Harvardissa on opiskellut monia Yhdysvaltain presidenttej, kuten esimerkiksi John F. Kennedy, Theodore Roosevelt, George W. Bush ja Barack Obama.

N cng l tp on u tin ti Bc M. i hc Harvard bao gm 10 trng con.
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: A Harvard Egyetem (Harvard University) amerikai magnegyetem a Massachusetts llambeli Cambridge-ben, tagja a legjobb egyetemeket magba foglal Borostyn Lignak. 1636. szeptember 8-n alaptottk, gy ez az USA legrgebb ta mkd felsoktatsi intzmnye. Nevt John Harvardrl kapta, aki a Cambridge-i Egyetemen tanult, s kezdetben a professzorok tbbsge is Cambridge-bl rkezett. A vrost, ahol az egyetemet alaptottk, ppen ezrt neveztk el Cambridge-nek, tisztelegve alma materk fel. A flrertsek elkerlse vgett a Harvardon megjelen publikcikra (knyvek, folyiratok, stb) a kiadsi helynl Cambridge neve mell mindig kirjk, hogy MA, utalva arra, hogy a Massachusetts llamban lv Cambridge-ben adtk ki, nem a brit sben. Eredetileg csak New College-nek hvtk, ksbb neveztk Harvard College-nak 1639. mrcius 13-n John Harvard paprl, aki az intzmny tmogatja volt. Az intzmnyt elszr 1780-ban neveztk egyetemnek a Massachusetts-i alkotmnyban. 1974-ta 19 Nobel-djas s 15 Pulitzer-djas dolgozott az egyetemen. A Harvard 2011-ben a Times Higher Education vilgranglistjnak els helyn vgzett. A lista a Thomson Reuters adatai, illetve az Ipsos Media 131 orszgra kiterjed felmrse s tbb mint 13 ezer akadmikus megkrdezsvel sszelltott statisztikja alapjn kszlt el. Jelenleg ez a vilg leggazdagabb egyeteme.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La Universidad de Harvard (Harvard University en ingls) es una universidad privada ubicada en Cambridge, Massachusetts, Estados Unidos. Forma parte de la Ivy League y es la institucin de enseanza superior ms antigua de los Estados Unidos. Hoy en da Harvard tiene, en promedio, una poblacin estudiantil de alrededor de 6,650 estudiantes de pregrado y unos 13,000 de postgrado.

Die Hochschule wurde 1636 von der Massachusetts Bay Colony gegrndet und ist damit die lteste Universitt in den Vereinigten Staaten. Die Umbenennung erfolgte 1639 in Anerkennung des Erbes von John Harvard. Harvard erreicht in internationalen Vergleichen regelmig einen Platz unter den besten Eliteuniversitten.
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: La Universidad de Harvard (Harvard University en ingls) es una universidad privada ubicada en Cambridge, Massachusetts, Estados Unidos. Forma parte de la Ivy League y es la institucin de enseanza superior ms antigua de los Estados Unidos. Hoy en da Harvard tiene, en promedio, una poblacin estudiantil de alrededor de 6,650 estudiantes de pregrado y unos 13,000 de postgrado. Es considerada la mejor universidad del mundo segn los siguientes rnkings de universidades: Academic Ranking of World Universities (ARWU) del Institute of Higher Education of Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Por delante de Stanford y de Berkeley. Ranking del Laboratorio de Cibermetra del Consejo Superior de Investigaciones Cientficas (CSIC) de Espaa. Por delante del MIT, de Stanford y de Berkeley.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Universitat de Harvard
Harvard University
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: De Harvard-universiteit is een Amerikaanse particuliere universiteit die hoofdzakelijk in Cambridge (Massachusetts) is gevestigd. De Harvard Business School ligt samen met de sportfaciliteiten, tegenover de rest van de campus aan de kant van Boston aan de rivier de Charles. De Harvard Medical School is gevestigd in het medische district Longwood dichter bij het centrum van Boston, waar een aantal bekende gespecialiseerde ziekenhuizen liggen. Ook het astronomisch observatorium, het Harvard Museum of Natural History en het Arnold Arboretum genieten wereldwijd bekendheid. Harvard is een van de meest prestigieuze universiteiten ter wereld, met zeer hoge toelatingseisen voor (aspirant-)studenten, hoge collegegelden, hoge salarissen voor hoogleraren en een grote kans op een uitstekend betaalde baan na het afstuderen. De universiteit weet vele gerenommeerde wetenschappers als hoogleraar binnen te halen, die elders in de Verenigde Staten of daarbuiten naam hebben gemaakt, waaronder verschillende Nobelprijswinnaars. Harvard heeft tevens de oudste zomerschool van de Verenigde Staten (opgericht in 1871), jaarlijks volgen meer dan 5000 studenten courses in uiteenlopende onderwerpen op de Harvard Summer School.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: La Universitat Harvard s una de les institucions educatives ms prestigioses del mn i la ms antiga dels Estats Units d'Amrica. Fundada el 8 de setembre de 1636 com a New College a Cambridge, va ser rebatejada el 13 de mar de 1639 en honor a John Harvard, un dels seus principals mecenes. Harvard s una universitat privada i compta amb el major pressupost manejat per una universitat en el planeta. Amb un percentatge d'admissi a vegades inferior al 10%, tamb s una de les ms selectives.

Harvard University r USA:s ldsta universitet, grundat den 18 september (8 september enl. g.s. ) 1636 i Cambridge (en frort till Boston) i Massachusetts, av regeringen i Massachusetts. Universitet tillhr de hgst ansedda i USA, r medlem av Ivy League och har traditionellt utbildat en stor del av USA:s politiska elit, ssom presidenterna George W. Bush, John F. Kennedy, Barack Obama och Franklin D. Roosevelt.

rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: A Universidade Harvard (em ingls Harvard University) uma das instituies educacionais mais prestigiadas do mundo, bem como a mais antiga instituio de ensino superior dos Estados Unidos. At 2011, ela era considerada a melhor universidade do mundo pelo Institute of Higher Education Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Fundada em 8 de Setembro de 1636 em Cambridge, Massachusetts, era chamada simplesmente de new college (universidade nova). Foi batizada ento em 13 de Maro de 1639 como Harvard College, em homenagem a John Harvard, um dos seus principais mecenas. A primeira vez na qual se mencionou a instituio como universidade foi em 1780.

L'Universit di Harvard (Harvard University), a Cambridge, nell'area metropolitana della citt di Boston nel Massachusetts, un'universit privata di grande notoriet ed il pi antico ateneo degli Stati Uniti d'America. Fa parte della Ivy League, associazione privata fra le otto universit pi antiche degli Stati Uniti, ed una delle tre pi prestigiose universit degli Stati Uniti d'America, assieme all'Universit Yale e all'Universit di Princeton. In numerose altre classifiche, tra cui la "The World University Rankings", stilata da QS Quacquarelli Symonds Network, per il 2010 l'Universit di Harvard preceduta da quella di Cambridge (UK). L'attuale rettore dell'Universit di Harvard la professoressa Drew Gilpin Faust.

Luniversit Harvard (Harvard University), ou plus simplement Harvard, est une universit prive amricaine situe Cambridge dans le Massachusetts. Fonde en 1636, elle est l'tablissement d'enseignement suprieur le plus ancien des tats-Unis. Elle fait partie du Ivy League, association non officielle regroupant les huit universits les plus anciennes et les plus clbres des tats-Unis. Quarante-cinq prix Nobel sont sortis de ses rangs (2010). Harvard est galement l'universit la plus riche du monde. Le corps enseignant est constitu de professeurs, pour tudiants undergraduate et tudiants graduate. Harvard attire des tudiants du monde entier (132 nationalits reprsentes en 2004).
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Universidade Harvard (em ingls Harvard University) uma das instituies educacionais mais prestigiadas do mundo, bem como a mais antiga instituio de ensino superior dos Estados Unidos. At 2011, ela era considerada a melhor universidade do mundo pelo Institute of Higher Education Shanghai Jiao Tong University. Fundada em 8 de Setembro de 1636 em Cambridge, Massachusetts, era chamada simplesmente de new college (universidade nova).
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Uniwersytet Harvarda (Harvard University) powsta w 8 wrzenia 1636 jako Harvard College w Newtown koo Bostonu jako pierwszy uniwersytet na terenie kolonii brytyjskich w Ameryce Pnocnej. Nazw otrzyma od nazwiska duchownego purytaskiego, wielebnego Johna Harvarda, ktry by pierwszym darczyc uczelni, wwczas bdcej college'em. Harvard oy na utrzymanie szkoy, od momentu jej powstania do swojej mierci. W testamencie zapisa jej swoj bibliotek i poow majtku. Imi Harvarda szkoa przyja w dniu 13 marca 1639. Pierwsze stypendia dla studentw tej uczelni ufundowaa w 1643 Ann Radcliffe. Studenci wielokrotnie protestowali przeciwko zemu ywieniu, np. w 1766 doszo do "buntu malanego", a w latach 1807-1808 do "buntu zepsutej kapusty". W 1771 mury Harvardu opucio 63 absolwentw. Mianem uniwersytetu (zamiast funkcjonujcej do tej pory nazwy college) posuya si po raz pierwszy Konstytucja Massachusetts z 1780. Na pocztku XIX szko zreformowano, gwnie za spraw George'a Ticknora. Gdy w 1823 na uczelni doszo do zamieszek, wydalono z niej 43 z 70 studentw. Ticknor, przeciwnik 20-tygodniowych wakacji letnich, zmusi studentw do uczestniczenia w kursach wbrew ich zainteresowaniom. Najwaniejszym wydarzeniem w dziejach Harvardu w drugiej poowie XIX wieku byy zmiany wprowadzone przez Charlesa Williama Eliota, prezydenta Uniwersytetu w latach 1869-1909. Zmusi on profesorw do prowadzenia bada. Doprowadzi te do zmian w programie nauczania, czc teoretyczn wiedz z praktyk. Obecnie na uniwersytecie studiuje okoo 20 tys. osb.
rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: A Harvard Egyetem (Harvard University) amerikai magnegyetem a Massachusetts llambeli Cambridge-ben, tagja a legjobb egyetemeket magba foglal Borostyn Lignak. 1636. szeptember 8-n alaptottk, gy ez az USA legrgebb ta mkd felsoktatsi intzmnye. Nevt John Harvardrl kapta, aki a Cambridge-i Egyetemen tanult, s kezdetben a professzorok tbbsge is Cambridge-bl rkezett. A vrost, ahol az egyetemet alaptottk, ppen ezrt neveztk el Cambridge-nek, tisztelegve alma materk fel.
rdf:Description.dbpedia-owl:abstract: Harvard University is an American private Ivy League research university located in Cambridge, Massachusetts, United States, established in 1636 by the Massachusetts legislature. Harvard is the oldest institution of higher learning in the United States and the first corporation (officially The President and Fellows of Harvard College) chartered in the country. Harvard's history, influence, and wealth have made it one of the most prestigious universities in the world. Harvard was named after its first benefactor, John Harvard. Although never formally affiliated with a church, the college primarily trained Congregationalist and Unitarian clergy. Harvard's curriculum and students became secular throughout the 18th century and by the 19th century had emerged as the central cultural establishment among Boston elites. Following the American Civil War, President Charles W. Eliot's forty year tenure (18691909) transformed the college and affiliated professional schools into a centralized research university, and Harvard became a founding member of the Association of American Universities in 1900. James Bryant Conant led the university through the Great Depression and World War II and began to reform the curriculum and liberalize admissions after the war. The undergraduate college became coeducational after its 1977 merger with Radcliffe College. Drew Gilpin Faust was elected the 28th president in 2007 and is the first woman to lead the university. Harvard has the largest financial endowment of any academic institution in the world, standing at $32 billion as of September 2011. The university comprises eleven separate academic unitsten faculties and the Radcliffe Institute for Advanced Studywith campuses throughout the Boston metropolitan area. Harvard's 210-acre (85ha) main campus is centered on Harvard Yard in Cambridge, approximately 3.4 miles (5.5km) northwest of downtown Boston. The business school and athletics facilities, including Harvard Stadium, are located across the Charles River in Allston and the medical, dental, and public health schools are located in the Longwood Medical Area. As of 2010, Harvard employs about 2,100 faculty to teach and advise approximately 6,700 undergraduates and 14,500 graduate and professional students. Eight U.S. presidents have been graduates, and 75 Nobel Laureates have been student, faculty, or staff affiliates. Harvard is also the alma mater of sixty-two living billionaires, the most in the country. The Harvard University Library is the largest academic library in the United States, and one of the largest in the world. The Harvard Crimson competes in 41 intercollegiate sports in the NCAA Division I Ivy League. Harvard has an intense athletic rivalry with Yale University traditionally culminating in The Game, although the HarvardYale Regatta predates the football game. This rivalry, though, is put aside every two years when the Harvard and Yale Track and Field teams come together to compete against a combined Oxford University and Cambridge University team, a competition that is the oldest continuous international amateur competition in the world.

Harvard University, esky Harvardova univerzita (nzev podle J. Harvarda, proto je oznaen Harvardsk chybn), byla zaloena roku 1636 a je nejstar univerzitou na zem USA. Sdl ve mst Cambridge ve stt Massachusetts v bostonsk aglomeraci a pat k nejprestinjm univerzitm ve Spojench sttech. Jako nesttn univerzita je rovn lenem Ivy League.
